divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my second floor balcony taking still pictures of an awesome storm rolling in when I first saw the object decend from between two massive clouds. I couldn't believe what I was seeing so I searched to see if anyone around was witnessing the same thing, but there was nobody else around. I looked up to see the object again, only to catch a blur of it speeding away. I dismissed the whole event until I realized I had captured it on film later that evening as I was reviewing all the pictures I has taken that day.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There was one other sighting in Austin on or around July 9th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: round metalic disc with dome in center
